archimate:Requirement.name: IA-5(16): Authenticator Management | In-person or Trusted External Party Authenticator Issuance
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Require that the issuance of [Assignment: organization-defined types of and/or specific authenticators] be conducted [Selection: in person; by a trusted external party] before [Assignment: organization-defined registration authority] with authorization by [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles].

properties.value: Issuing authenticators in person or by a trusted external party enhances and reinforces the trustworthiness of the identity proofing process.
